Several stellar cycles passed since the Decepticon femme fatale went 
missi=
ng. 
Had anyone wondered where she'd gotten to? What became of her? 

No, t=
hese were not thoughts running through her processor. For that had 
decayed=
. That part of her that was organic was now gone, decayed having 
rotted aw=
ay. But those parts of her that were metallic and machine... 
was barely th=
ere. Rusted and decaying as well. 
All that lay in the darken remains was a=
 small indestructable hull, a 
chamber that held her very weak spark. 

Unk=
nown location, far from where she once called her home base with the

cons, far from the reaches of their scanners.

r the lava that was touching the
